mapper.select: select * from question as q, customers as c where q.member_code = c.member_code order by q.question_date desc

select q.question_num, c.member_code, c.member_name, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_date from question as q, customers as c where c.member_code = #{member_code} and q.member_code = c.member_code order by q.question_date desc
